translation.en: OPTIMUS: Earth, birthplace of the human race,
translation.zh:
地球
人类的诞生地

translation.en: a species much like our own,
capable of great compassion
and great violence.
translation.zh:
（公元前17000年）
同时也极其暴力

translation.en: For in our quest to protect the humans,
translation.zh: 在我们保护人类的进程中

translation.en: a deeper revelation dawns.
Our worlds have met before.
FEMALE ANNOUNCER 1: Newsflash from the BBC.
MALE ANNOUNCER: Breaking news out of Shanghai.
There's been a major toxic spill
in the Shanghai factory district.
FEMALE ANNOUNCER 2: We're staying
on top of this developing story for you.
We will bring you any new information as we get it.
translation.zh: 我们将为您及时报道最新动态

translation.en: WOMAN: NEST Seahawks approaching target.
SOLDIER: Three minutes until evacuation is complete, sir.
Chinese airspace has been locked and sealed, one-mile radius.
translation.zh: 中国领空封锁 一英里范围 非常作战队前进

translation.en: All right, give NEST team the go.
translation.zh: 非常作战队前进 黑鹰 可以降落

translation.en: Black Hawks, you're clear to land.
Ding-a-ling! Come out and get your ice cream.
translation.zh: 叮铃铃 快来买雪糕

translation.en: Any bad robot out there better get ready for an ass-whupping.
translation.zh:
坏机器人都给我听好了
你们等着被我打屁股吧

translation.en: OPTIMUS: For the last two years,
an advance team of new Autobots
translation.zh: 一支由汽车人组成的先遣队

translation.en: has taken refuge here under my command.
translation.zh: 在我的指挥下寻求庇护

translation.en: MAN ON PA: Arcees, get ready to launch.
We're locked and loaded.
OPTIMUS: Together, we form an alliance with the humans,
a secret but brave squad of soldiers.
translation.zh: 他们是秘密而勇敢的战士

translation.en: All right, listen up. China's cover story on this one is "toxic spill."
translation.zh:
听清楚了
媒体报导说是毒物外泄

translation.en: They had to evac the area for search and rescue.
translation.zh: 他们必须要疏散民众搜索营救

translation.en: This makes six enemy contacts in eight months.
translation.zh: 在八个月内与敌接触六次

translation.en: We gotta make sure this one does not
translation.zh: 所以这次行动绝对保密

translation.en: get out in the public eye, so keep it tight.
OPTIMUS: A classified strike team called NEST.
translation.zh: 一个秘密别动队叫〝鸟巢〞

translation.en: We hunt for what remains of our Decepticon foes
translation.zh: 我们继续搜寻霸天虎敌人残余势力

translation.en: hiding in different countries around the globe.
translation.zh: 隐藏在地球的不同角落

translation.en: SOLDIER: Roll in Alpha through Echo now.
Move out! Let's go!
All right, Ironhide. We got echoes. Vamos.
translation.zh: 铁皮 我们收到回音 它们不远了

translation.en: Steel stacks at 2 o'clock.
He's here. I smell him.
translation.zh: 它在这里 我能闻出

translation.en: It's close. It's getting closer.
-Oh, no. -What have you got?
Thermal ripple.
Right, everybody, be steady. We're right on top of it.
translation.zh: 保持稳定 我们很快就能接近

translation.en: Eagle niner!
SOLDIER: I need an energy proton.
Panther 1, requesting fire mission now!
translation.zh: 黑豹一号 马上要求开火

translation.en: Gunships on station. Roll in hot!
translation.zh: 战斗机已就绪！派进开火！

translation.en: PILOT: Dog 1, now we are engaging.
translation.zh: 直升机已就位 马上赶到

translation.en: We got a second Decepticon.
Arcee twins! Target coming your way!
translation.zh: 雅希！双胞胎！目标向你飞来！

translation.en: I got him, I got him!
I screwed that up. I'm okay. I'm all right.
This is combat, man.
Total brain freeze, man.
What's wrong with you?
Bring in Sideswipe!
Clear a path.
Damn, I'm good!
Air support, we need Big Buddha to deliver the drop now!
translation.zh: 空中支援 我们需要大佛运来空投物资

translation.en: PILOT: Cyclone 98, final attack hitting in 120.
translation.zh: 旋风98 超低飞进 最后进攻前往120

translation.en: Clear to drop in five, four, three, two, one.
Autobots, I'm in pursuit!
Pull over!
Punk-ass Decepticon!
Any last words?
This is not your planet to rule!
The Fallen shall rise again.
That doesn't sound good.
Not today.
RON: Come on, let's go! All hands on deck!
translation.zh: 快点 该走了 都出来吧

translation.en: Frankie, Mojo, out! Come on, kiddo, we're on a schedule.
translation.zh:
弗兰克 舟舟 出去！
我们做事有计划！

translation.en: SAM: Slow down, Dad. Why are you in such a hurry to get rid of me?
translation.zh:
慢点 老爸
这么着急赶我走 干嘛？

translation.en: Did you rent the room out? No, I got other ideas for your room
translation.zh:
你把我的房间租出去了？
我另有打算

translation.en: and it rhymes with "home theater."
translation.zh: 把你的房间变成家庭影院

translation.en: Look what I found. It's your little baby booties.
translation.zh: 我找到你小时候穿过的小鞋

translation.en: Oh, Ma.
My little baby-bootie boy.
-You can't go. -You see this, Dad? This is how
you're supposed to react when the fruit of your loins
translation.zh: 您看 儿子就要踏入社会了

translation.en: goes out into the cruel world to fend for himself, okay?
Yeah, my heart bleeds for you, pal. College, bummer!
translation.zh: 我的心为你流血 要上大学了 老弟

translation.en: You have to come home every holiday, not just big ones.
translation.zh: 逢假期就回家 不能放大假才回来

translation.en: You have to come home for Halloween.
translation.zh: 不能放大假才回来 万圣节要回来

translation.en: Well, I can't come home for Halloween, Mom.
translation.zh:
-妈 我回不来
-那我们去找你

translation.en: -Well, then we'll come to you. -You're not coming.
translation.zh:
-妈 我回不来
-那我们去找你 我们不出门

translation.en: -No, we're not going anywhere. -We'll dress up.
We'll be in costumes. You'll never know it's us.
translation.zh: 我们穿鬼衣 你根本认不出

translation.en: You can't do that, Mom. Would you let the kid breathe,
for crying out loud? Come on. Go pack.
There's no way you're packed for a month-long trip.
translation.zh: 你收的肯定不够旅行一个月

translation.en: Come on, chop, chop! Let's go. March, young lady.
Oh, Dad.
I love it when you call me "young lady,"
-You dirty old man. -You ain't seen nothing yet.
-Dad, Dad, Dad, whoa! -What?
I'm watching what you're doing, Dad. It's not a rap video.
It's just like a coach thing.
That was a really creepy move just now, Dad.
translation.zh: 我刚才都起鸡皮疙瘩了

translation.en: Look. You know, your mother and me are really proud of you.
translation.zh: 你妈和我都为你感到自豪

translation.en: You're the first Witwicky ever to go to college.
translation.zh: 你是咱家第一个大学生

translation.en: Now I'm crying again! This sucks!i
translation.zh: 我又想哭了 我忍不住！

translation.en: You're gonna be okay, Ma.
You know, it's just going to be,
you know, hard for her to accept
that her boy's all grown up, you know,
going out to handle the world on his own.
-You okay, Pop? -Yeah.
Mojo, no dominating Frankie.
translation.zh: 舟舟 不许欺负弗兰克

translation.en: Get the hell off the couch, you filthy beasts.
You'll see a lot of that in college, too.
What are you talking about, Dad?
There's gonna be a lot of women there.
Yeah, well, I'm a one-woman kind of guy.
translation.zh: 我可是用情专一的男生

translation.en: Look, Mikaela's the greatest,
but you gotta give each other room to grow, okay?
translation.zh: 但你们都需要成长的空间

translation.en: You're no different than any other couple your age.
translation.zh: 你们跟同龄恋人没两样

translation.en: Except we discovered an alien race together.
translation.zh: 我们一起发现过外星人

translation.en: (SCOFFS) How long you gonna be riding that scooter?
translation.zh: 只有这话题看你能撑多久？

translation.en: Dad, listen, I know what the odds are. We're the exception, okay?
translation.zh:
爸 别人有可能分手
但我们是例外 知道了吗？

translation.en: Wait a second. Who could that be?
In two weeks, it could be Muffy.
translation.zh: 两周后换别的女孩打给你了

translation.en: Hey, beautiful.
-I'm breaking up with you, Sam. -Really?
translation.zh: 山姆 我要跟你分手

translation.en: You sure? I'm not hearing a lot of conviction.
Well, I am, okay? So, there's no reason
translation.zh: 真的 所以我不必去

translation.en: for me to come say good-bye to you.
Wow, you almost sounded serious that time.
Guess what? I made you a long-distance relationship kit.
translation.zh:
猜猜看？
我给你做了网聊装备

translation.en: Yeah, I got you a webcam, so we can chat 24/7.
translation.zh: 有网络摄影机 随时可以聊天

translation.en: All Witwicky, all the time.
And I got you a couple souvenirs from the event
that cannot be mentioned on cell phones.
Some mixes and candles and stuff.
Sounds cute. I can't wait.
translation.zh: 不错嘛 我等不及了

translation.en: Hey! You want the infamous D-Day shirt?
translation.zh: 你要那天我穿的汗衫吗？

translation.en: You kept your nasty, shredded clothes?
translation.zh: 你把那件臭汗衫还留着？

translation.en: Yeah. Of course, I kept it, Mikaela.
translation.zh: 是啊 我当然得留着

translation.en: It's like my Super Bowl jersey. I bled in this thing.
translation.zh: 这是染着我鲜血的战袍啊

translation.en: Wow. You're pretty confident, huh? No, it's not that.
translation.zh:
-你真自信
-那到没有 而是…

translation.en: It's just that my low self-esteem's at an all-time high.
translation.zh:
我好不容易
才找到当英雄的感觉

translation.en: You think your little box of souvenirs
is gonna keep me from leaving you?
You really should come with me.
They got cheap apartments near campus.
Well, that's not gonna happen until I get my man-child father,
fresh out of prison, back on his feet.
translation.zh: 能自己打理修车行才行

translation.en: I heard that. Where'd you put the clutch covers?
MIKAELA: Next to the camshafts.
(EXCLAIMS) I love it when you say "camshafts."
Whisper it to me.
Camshafts.
Why can't I hate you?
SAM: It's my Witwicky charm.
Wait, hold on. Wait, hold on a second.
I guess we're not breaking up. I'll be over in 20.
translation.zh:
我觉得我们不会分手
二十分钟后见

translation.en: Mikaela, I think a sliver of the Cube got stuck on my shirt.
translation.zh:
米吉拉 立方体上的银屑
粘在我的衬衣上

translation.en: Sam?
There's a fire! Dad, we got a fire!
translation.zh:
着火了！
爸爸！着火了！

translation.en: SAM: Fire!
(CRYING) Ron, did you know it was gonna be this hard?
translation.zh: 老公 我哪知道会有这么难受？

translation.en: Can you just stop?
Yeah, okay, I'll stop. You carry this shit!
-Wow. -Do you know what?
-What? -I don't want to go anywhere with you.
I don't wanna go to France with you.
I don't wanna go around the corner with you.
-I'm going back inside. -All right, fine.
I'll call you from Paris.
What is all the racket?
-Whoa! -Sam?
Dad!
-What was that? -That's the whole kitchen.
RON: Bumblebee... Oh, my...
Bumblebee!
SAM: Bumblebee!
Get in the garage. Go!
JUDY: What the freak just happened?
SAM: I'm about to have a nervous breakdown.
Just go in the garage quietly, please.
Holy Mother!
JUDY: Oh, my God!
Whatever.
Get in the garage now!
JUDY: Firemen! Fire fighters, over here!
translation.zh: 消防员 火警在这里

translation.en: RON:Dogs out! Get the dogs out!
This is it!
Come on, you guys. What are you waiting for?
JUDY: My house is on fire!
...very important.
What happened?
Come here. Listen, I need you to take the Cube sliver and put it in your purse.
translation.zh:
过来
快把立方体装进你提包里

translation.en: -What's going on? -Just take it.
-Sam Witwicky. A word with you? -Yes, Mom. Yeah.
-Hi, Mikaela. I have a bald spot. -Hi.
translation.zh: 米吉拉 我头顶秃了一片

translation.en: An old furnace, I think.
JUDY: From a waffle iron.
When you go, he goes.
I cannot live with a psychotic alien in my garage.
translation.zh: 我不让神经病机器人住车库里

translation.en: (SHUSHING) Judy... National Security.
translation.zh: 茱蒂 嘘！国安局的人

translation.en: Look, if we stay quiet, they're gonna take care of everything.
translation.zh: 我们悄不作声 他们就会给我们修屋

translation.en: Just consider this the official start of our remodel, okay?
translation.zh: 就当是政府赞助我们重新装修？

translation.en: Fine. If the government's paying, I want a pool and a hot tub.
translation.zh:
如果政府掏腰包 我还想要泳池呢！
还有喷泉浴缸！

translation.en: And I'm gonna skinny-dip and you can't say shit about it!
translation.zh: 我还要裸泳 你有意见就死定了！

translation.en: (EXCLAIMING) Yeah, you know you're in trouble.
He still having voice problems?
He's playing it up.
Bee, I want to talk to you about the college thing, okay?
translation.zh: 阿蜂 我想跟你谈谈上大学的事

translation.en: WOMAN SINGING ON RADIO: ♪ I'm so excited and I just can't hide it ♪
translation.zh: 我好兴奋 无法掩饰

translation.en: SAM: Hey, I'm not taking you with me.
I'm gonna wait outside, okay?
SAM: I meant to tell you about this earlier.
It's just that, you know... Here's the thing.
Freshmen aren't allowed to have cars.
I know, and if it was up to me,
I'd take you with me, but it's not, Bee.
translation.zh: 肯定带你去 但不行

translation.en: Look. You're an Autobot. You shouldn't be living in my dad's garage.
translation.zh: 你是汽车人 住在老爸车房里会憋死

translation.en: I mean, you're suffocating in here.
translation.zh: 住在老爸车房里会憋死

translation.en: You deserve better than this.
This is hard enough, man. Don't make it harder.
translation.zh: 这件事够难 别添乱了

translation.en: Can you just look at me, please?
Come on, big guy. Look, the guardian thing is done.
Okay? You did your job. Look, I'm safe now.
translation.zh:
干得很好
我现在安全了

translation.en: You need to go be with Optimus Prime and the others.
I just want to be normal, Bee.
That's why I'm going to college,
and I can't do that with you.
It's not the last time I'm gonna see you, you know, Bee.
Come on, don't do that. Bee.
You're killing me, Bee.
But you'll always be my first car.
translation.zh: 你永远是我的第一部车

translation.en: Love you, Bee.
(EXCLAIMS) Wow!
Between State Farm and the taxpayers, we're all taken care of.
translation.zh: 保险公司和政府钱库撑腰 我们不怕

translation.en: -You got dirt all over you. -Stop. Stop.
-What? -Stop, I'm okay.
translation.zh: 得了 我没事 看看

translation.en: Look.
So, you think you can make it through
those East Coast winters without me?
You're the best thing to ever happen to me.
translation.zh: 你是我今生最珍贵的礼物

translation.en: And?
And I'll do anything for you.
And?
I think Sam's about to say the L-word.
translation.zh: 我看山姆要说出那个字了 我们走了！

translation.en: Nice timing, Dad.
I adore you.
That's not the word that I want
translation.zh: 我想听的 不是这个词

translation.en: -to hear right now. -What are you talking about? It's the same word as the other word.
translation.zh: 这跟另一个词一个意思

translation.en: It's not the same word. If I say the other word now
and you forced me to say it, it won't mean anything, plus
translation.zh: 你逼我 就没意思了

translation.en: you haven't said it either. So, don't get mad at me for not saying it.
translation.zh:
再说 你也没说出口
所以你没理由生我气

translation.en: Yeah, but I haven't said it because guys
always run when you say it first.
So do girls. Especially girls like you, with options.
translation.zh: 男女都一样 尤其像你这种抢手辣妹

translation.en: So, this is all part of your elaborate plan to keep me interested?
It can be.
I hate that it's working.
Can I have a kiss?
We're going to make it work, I promise.
translation.zh: 我们要努力经营这段感情

translation.en: FEMALE HAS SLIVER FROM CUBE
translation.zh: （女生拿着立方体掉下的碎片）

translation.en: Soundwave acknowledges. Pursue her.
Retrieve it.
MAN ON PA: Autobot twins, report to Hangar Three.
translation.zh: 汽车人双胞胎 向三号机库汇报

translation.en: Bad-ass ice-cream truck coming through.
translation.zh: 坏蛋雪糕车来了 让路！

translation.en: Excuse me! Excuse me! Hello! No, I don't...
Hold up. Those are nice.
Yeah, baby, it's upgrade time.
Yes, sir. Yeah! Look here, it's my booty call right here!
Time to get my sexy on with the green.
Green? No, green is mine.
I call green.
-I got the green. -That hurt, man.
It's supposed to hurt. It's an ass-kicking.
translation.zh: 就让你觉得痛！就是要打你！

translation.en: SOLDIER: Present arms!
LENNOX: Director Galloway, what an honor.
I'd love to show you around,
but you gotta be on the classified access list.
I am now. Presidential order, Major.
I got a message for your classified space buddies.
translation.zh: 我给你的外星朋友捎信来了！

translation.en: You guys made a mess of Shanghai.
All right, so this is where we communicate with the JCS
translation.zh: 我们就在这儿与联席总参联络

translation.en: and this area serves as the Autobots' hangar.
translation.zh: 这里就是汽车人的机库

translation.en: SOLDIER: Secure link to JCS is up, Major.
translation.zh: 与联席总参正在连线 少校

translation.en: U.S. MILITARY SATELLITE
SOLDIER ON RADIO: Secure line to the Pentagon is now open.
LENNOX: General?
Will, I saw the Shanghai Op.
GENERAL: We had a rough day out there. LENNOX: Yes, sir.
We have intel that I believe warrants an immediate debrief.
translation.zh: 我们有情报批准立即听取报告

translation.en: Now with your permission, I can't let you see him,
but I would like you to hear from the leader of the Autobots.
translation.zh: 但可听汽车人领袖的声音

translation.en: Proceed.
You gotta wonder,
if God made us in his image, who made him?
translation.zh:
上帝若以自己的形象造人
那谁造上帝？

translation.en: General, our alliance has countermanded
six Decepticon incursions this year,
each on a different continent.
They're clearly searching around the world for something,
translation.zh: 它们明显在全球搜寻什么

translation.en: but last night's encounter came with a warning.
translation.zh: 但昨晚的交火是个警告

translation.en: DECEPTICON ON RECORDING: "The Fallen shall rise again."
"The Fallen." Meaning what?
OPTIMUS: Origin unknown. The only recorded history of our race
translation.zh: 出处不详 唯一有记录的历史就是

translation.en: was contained within the AllSpark
translation.zh: 我族群被困在火种源内

translation.en: and lost with its destruction.
Excuse me!
With this so-called AllSpark now destroyed,
translation.zh:
所谓的火种源已被毁 怎么敌人没按您预想
离开地球呢？

translation.en: why hasn't the enemy left the planet like you thought they would?
translation.zh:
怎么敌人没按您预想
离开地球呢？

translation.en: Director Galloway, our National Security Advisor.
translation.zh: 高主任 国安局顾问

translation.en: The President just appointed him liaison.
Well, I guess I didn't get that memo.
GALLOWAY: Forgive the interruption, General.
Excuse me. Coming through.
Excuse me. Excuse me, soldier.
After all the damage in Shanghai,
the President is hard-pressed to say the job's getting done.
translation.zh:
总统很难开口
说你们圆满完成任务

translation.en: Now, under the classified Alien/Autobot Cooperation Act,
translation.zh: 在外星汽车人秘密合作法令下

translation.en: you agreed to share your intel with us,
translation.zh: 你们同意与我们分享情报

translation.en: but not your advancements in weaponry.
translation.zh:
但是
不给我们武器使用权

translation.en: We've witnessed your human capacity for war.
translation.zh: 我们目睹人类对战争的容量

translation.en: It would absolutely bring more harm than good.
But who are you to judge what's best for us?
With all due respect, we've been fighting side by side
in the field for two years.
We've shed blood, sweat and precious metal together.
translation.zh: 我们一起流血流汗 同生共死

translation.en: Soldier, you're paid to shoot, not talk.
translation.zh: 士兵 打你的仗去 少插嘴

translation.en: Don't tempt me.
GALLOWAY: And the newest members of your team.
translation.zh: 你们团队的最新成员 放松

translation.en: OPTIMUS: Easy.
GALLOWAY: I understand they arrived here
after you sent a message into space,
an open invitation to come to Earth,
vetted by no one at the White House.
Let me stop you right there, Mr. Galloway.
It was vetted right here.
translation.zh: 我们在这里做出正确决定

translation.en: And in my experience, the judgment
of both Major Lennox and his team
has always been above reproach.
Well, be that as it may, General,
translation.zh: 好 即使是如此 将军

translation.en: it is the position of the President
that when our national security is at stake,
no one is above reproach.
Now, what do we know so far?
We know that the enemy leader,
classified NBE One, aka Megatron,
translation.zh: 我们知道敌人的领袖 亦称为NBE-1 也叫威震天

translation.en: is rusting in peace at the bottom of the Laurentian Abyssal,
translation.zh: 正在加拿大东岸的深海里生锈

translation.en: surrounded by SOSUS detection nets
and a full-time submarine surveillance.
We also know that the only remaining piece of your alien AllSpark
translation.zh: 我们也知外星火种源的唯一碎片

translation.en: is locked in an electromagnetic vault
here on one of the most secure naval bases in the world.
SOUNDWAVE: Decepticons, we have located the shard.
translation.zh: 霸天虎 我们已找到碎片

translation.en: And since no one can seem to tell me what the enemy is now after,
translation.zh:
既然没有人
能告诉我敌人究竟想要什么

translation.en: well, there's only one clear conclusion.
You! The Autobots!
They're here to hunt you.
What's there to hunt for on Earth besides that?
translation.zh: 地球上除此它们还要什么？

translation.en: "The Fallen shall rise again"?
It sounds to me like something's coming.
So, let me ask, if we ultimately conclude
translation.zh: 我问你 如果为国家安全着想

translation.en: that our national security is best served
by denying you further asylum on our planet,
will you leave peacefully?
Freedom is your right.
If you make that request, we will honor it.
But before your President decides, please ask him this.
translation.zh: 但是 趁你们的总统尚未定夺

translation.en: What if we leave and you're wrong?
translation.zh:
如果我们离开后 发现你们错了
有后悔药吃吗？

translation.en: That's a good question.
Oh, my gosh! Look at this place.
I feel smarter already.
translation.zh: 我已经觉得自己变聪明了

translation.en: Ron, can you smell it?
Yeah, smells like $40,000 a year.
Hey, cheapo.
Hey, go ahead. We'll get your stuff.
translation.zh: 去吧 我们给你拿东西 去看看房间

translation.en: Just go ahead and check out your room. Yeah, go.
-Hey. -Hey.
-You must be Sam, right? -I'm Leo.
translation.zh: 你一定是山姆 我叫利欧

translation.en: Hey.
So, I already set up the crib a bit.
You want this side or that side?
-That side. -I already chose that side.
You know what this is? This is the awkward moment.
translation.zh: 你什么意思？想让我难堪？

translation.en: Yeah, see, you're trying to see if I'm a normal guy.
I'm trying to see if you're a normal guy.
Balanced, unmedicated, nothing under the crawl space.
Good hygiene, won't stab me.
translation.zh: 卫生习惯好 不在睡觉时捅我

translation.en: No criminal record, won't steal anything.
-Including girlfriends. -Especially girlfriends.
-You got a girlfriend? -I do. You?
(LAUGHING) No, not a chance.
You a techie?
Sweet! Sharsky, Fassbinder, where we at?
translation.zh: 太好了 史达基 法斯宾 怎样？

translation.en: FASSBINDER: Server's almost online, Leo.
SHARSKY: Network's up and running.
Beautiful, that's what I like to hear.
That's Sharsky, that's Fassbinder, my IT gurus.
translation.zh: 史达基和法斯宾 我的电脑导师

translation.en: Welcome to my empire, bro, TheRealEffingDeal.com.
translation.zh: 欢迎进入我的帝国 〝天才网站〞

translation.en: That's me, I'm sure you've heard of it.
-No, I haven't. -Well, that sucks.
-What is all this for? -LEO: See where I'm going, bro.
Look, call me gross, I want to be a baby billionaire.
translation.zh:
看 我很俗
我想当亿万富翁

translation.en: Kitten calendars. That's where I started. Look at me now.
translation.zh:
嘭！猫咪日历
我就这样开始 看看我

translation.en: Got to have dreams, bro.
Leo! We got some brand-new Shanghai vid.
Post it, baby. Go, go, go! FTJ! FTJ!
What's "FTJ"?
"Fuel the Jet."
Fuel the Jet, bro.
FASSBINDER: FTJ. FTJ, legit!
Did you see that? Did you see that?
Look at this. Half of Shanghai gets
wrecked and China says "gas leak."
Don't believe the hype, bro.
SHARSKY: Just like the alien robots in LA two years ago
translation.zh: 就像两年前在洛杉矶 掩盖外星机器人

translation.en: that everyone covered up.
Yeah, I saw these robots, and they did this, like, firing thing
translation.zh: 我见过机器人 会开火

translation.en: and they came down and toasted
this woman, and she was like...
-It looks fake to me. -FASSBINDER: Dude, it's not fake.
The Internet is pure truth. Video doesn't lie.
translation.zh: 网络上全是真的 录影不会撒谎

translation.en: -It looks fake. -No, man, I've seen them.
They're, like, these robots...
translation.zh: 我全看了 都是机器人

translation.en: Look, look, it's fake.
Anybody could do it on any computer, okay?
translation.zh: 任何人用电脑都能做出

translation.en: And I wasn't there,
so I can't comment or speculate.
-No. -"Comment or speculate"?
translation.zh: 议论或推测？ 你还是我室友吗？

translation.en: And we're supposed to cohabitate?
No, listen, okay? Don't be sucking the sack, bro.
translation.zh: 别什么都听信政府瞎扯！

translation.en: -Which sack? -The ball sack.
Dude, what kind of tool are you?
Mainstream media sack.
They're lying to us, all right?
-It's aliens, man. -Okay, okay.
Follow me.
Uh-oh! Leo, bad news.
We just got scooped. The video's already up on GFR.
translation.zh: 我们被甩了 录影已上别家网站

translation.en: Fassbinder!
Robo-Warrior, the guy's our main
competition on conspiracy stuff.
"Effing" was my F-ing idea and he stole it.
translation.zh: 阴谋论我提出 被他偷

translation.en: He's been linking to my site and thieving hits forever.
translation.zh: 他连线在我的网站然后做贼

translation.en: By the way, I read your file. I'm poor, you're poor.
translation.zh: 我看了你的档案 你我都穷

translation.en: We're gonna fix that, all right? You work for me now.
translation.zh: 我看了你的档案 你我都穷 你为我干活

translation.en: I work for you now? That's incredible.
translation.zh: 我为你干活？ 大学第一天就被拉进网络公司当苦力

translation.en: It's first day of college, I got a career in a dinky Internet firm
translation.zh: 大学第一天就被拉进网络公司当苦力

translation.en: with a boss who is made up of just pure champion stuff.
Are you mocking my life's work, Samuel?
That's your one warning patrolling, dude. Don't make me
have Fassbinder hack your financial aid, 'cause I'll do it.
translation.zh: 让法斯宾黑你的奖学金

translation.en: Hey, RA. Listen, it's getting a little intense in my room.
translation.zh: 舍监 我房里充满火药味

translation.en: Can I switch out?
Sad face, 312. No switching, no trading.
Let's turn that frown upside down, okay?
Oh, here we go. We made it. Hi.
It's just like Hogwarts.
-Hi. -Is this co-ed?
-This is a co-ed dorm. -You guys want
translation.zh: 男女混合宿舍 想见我的室友？

translation.en: -to meet my roommates? -JUDY: Yeah.
-Here's Leo. -We're the Witwickys.
translation.zh: 这是利欧 我们是威家人

translation.en: -I'm Leo. -I'm Judy.
Hey, you have a great son, you really do.
translation.zh: 你们儿子很棒 真的

translation.en: Well, aren't you the sweetest thing?
Yeah, he's real sweet, Ma.
What is that in your hand, by the way?
I got this at the bake sale for the environment
that those boys are having.
You know, you don't often see white boys
with the dreadlocks.
-Mom? -Yeah, it's 100% pure,
Hawaiian green for the environment.
translation.zh:
绿色环保 -你吃了多少？
-放下吧

translation.en: -How many have you eaten? -Drop it.
-SAM: What is this? -Yeah, they baked it with reefer.
-No, it's... -Please, give me...
translation.zh:
-不 这是我…
-妈 您快给我

translation.en: Hey! It's my cheat day. I can eat what I want.
translation.zh: 今天不减肥 我想吃什么随便

translation.en: I'm going to freak out. Please do something right now, Dad.
translation.zh: 我快吓死了 老爸 快想办法

translation.en: Please do something right now.
I can eat all the fricking brownies I want.
translation.zh: 我想吃多少松糕都由我

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
I'm sorry and you're welcome.
We call it the "Hot Freshman 55."
translation.zh: 妈哟！这里竟然有辣妹！55名火辣妞

translation.en: Sharsky hacked Campus Housing
and stacked the dorm with pretty Betties.
Is... Is so nice...
Oh, my God. That's her. She's coming. She sees me, she sees me.
translation.zh:
啊哟 是她
她看见我了

translation.en: She's tied for number one on my to-do list.
translation.zh: 她是我的第一号种子选手

translation.en: Do not bird-dog my quail, you hear me?
Pretty girls! Hey, you. My son lives in this dorm.
You should go make friends with him. He's Sam.
translation.zh: 跟他交朋友呀 他叫山姆

translation.en: MALE STUDENT: Glad she ain't my mama.
And he recently had his cherry popped.
He didn't know I was in the house. I heard it all.
translation.zh: 他不知我在家！我全听到了！

translation.en: -Hey, hey, hey! -Here he is.
He would get in my closet and dress up as Boy Spice.
translation.zh: 他钻进我的衣橱里扮小辣弟

translation.en: Hey, and his car is a talking robot!
translation.zh: 他的汽车是会说话的机器人！

translation.en: No, like the GPS. OnStar!
translation.zh: 像环球定位仪 驾车宝那种

translation.en: -OnStar. -JUDY: Frisbee.
No, Dad. Dad, you just gonna
let her run around the school?
Give it. Mine, mine, mine.
translation.zh: 给我！归我了！ 你疯了吗？

translation.en: MAN: Hey! Crazy!
You want it?
I want it.
Judy, Judy, just... Just put it down.
-You gotta control your mother. -I don't know who this woman is.
translation.zh:
-管管老妈啦！
-我不认得这女人！

translation.en: Hey, Professor, I'd do anything for an A.
translation.zh: 教授 为得高分 叫我做啥都行

translation.en: All right, Grace Slick. We got some snacks in the car.
translation.zh: 好 小姐 汽车里有零食

translation.en: Let's go.
Did you get the booties? All right.
translation.zh: 她的包包呢？ 爸 我拿着呢！

translation.en: Yes, Dad, I got the booties!
I'm upside down.
Black Lion X-Ray, this is Black Lion Tango.
translation.zh: 黑狮X光 我们已经启动

translation.en: We have activation of motion sensors
translation.zh: 西边界 行动感应器

translation.en: on the western perimeter fence.
MAN ON PA: Breach at B-14.
Go, go, go, go!
SOLDIER: The shard's gone.
Contact!
SOLDIER 1: Take it down!
SOLDIER 2: Which way? SOLDIER 3: Shoot left.
Knock it down.
First frat party's the game changer.
Boys, we're hunting in the wild now.
So, get your game faces on.
I can't stay long. I have a webcam date with my girlfriend.
translation.zh: 我不能久留 跟女友有网约

translation.en: -That's so cool! -No, it's not.
While he's making out with his MacBook,
I'm gonna be getting my Spitzy freaky freak on.
Let's roll.
She's hot.
Bro, we're hunting.
-See you, darling. -Bye, Dad.
translation.zh:
-回见 乖女儿
-再见 爸爸

translation.en: Okay.
This is our first live chat date. I've never done it before.
translation.zh:
这是我们第一次网约
我没玩过

translation.en: I'm kind of nervous.
-GIRL: Are you okay? -No.
I was getting a napkin for my drink.
Thanks. Cheers.
-It's Sam, right? -Yeah.
I wanna dance.
What, like... Like dancing?
Like a pairing? Like a duo? Like a coupling?
'Cause I'm in a permanently semi...
I'm in a relationship, kind of...
Relax. I just want to have some fun.
translation.zh:
别紧张
我只想开心一下

translation.en: Wanna have some fun?
Yeah, okay. Let's play some checkers. You can sit over there and...
translation.zh: 好啊 我们玩跳棋 你坐在那里

translation.en: Oh, my...
So, how about tonight
you pretend I'm your girlfriend
translation.zh: 假装我是你女友好不好？

translation.en: and I pretend that you're my boyfriend?
Hey! Who drove the freaking yellow Camaro?
translation.zh: 嗨！黄色雪佛兰车是谁的？

translation.en: There is a car on the lawn
What are you doing?
MAN ON RADIO: Houston, we have a problem.
translation.zh: 休斯敦 我们遇到状况

translation.en: -What is it? -FRAT GUY: Freshman!
-Yeah? -Is that your car in our bushes?
No, there's a friend of mine.
He just went to get you a tighter shirt.
There isn't a tighter shirt. We checked.
translation.zh: 换个鬼 我们查过了

translation.en: Now how about I park my foot in your ass?
-What size shoe do you wear? -Yeah?
-Hold on. -FRAT GUY: You wanna try?
SAM: I'll back it up right now.
Get him out of here.
You have a ride? Bro, why are you holding out on us?
translation.zh: 让他赶紧走 你有车？怎么不告诉我们？

translation.en: I've only known you 17 hours.
LEO: This is gonna really change our lives. You have no idea.
translation.zh:
这能彻底改变我们的人生
你不懂

translation.en: I love Camaros.
I can't do this right now, okay?
-Don't be a wimp. -Oh, God!
My first car was my dad's '92 Z28.
translation.zh: 我第一辆车是爸爸92年的雪佛兰

translation.en: Yeah?
Fuel-injected.
The roar of the engine, it just tickles me.
translation.zh: 发动机的吼声真让人兴奋

translation.en: We shouldn't stare...
I mean, share stories with each other at all.
translation.zh: 不对 我们不应分享故事

translation.en: Come on, Sam. Just one ride.
translation.zh: 山姆 走呀 带我去兜风嘛！

translation.en: MAN SINGING ON RADIO: ♪ Your cheatin' heart ♪
Don't. Don't! ♪ She's a super freak, super freak She's super freaky ♪
translation.zh:
-少来 别唱！
-她是超浪豪放女

translation.en: Is your radio broken?
No, my concentration is.
We're not cheating.
Not yet.
Is something wrong here?
God! You okay?
Ow!
I really don't know what to tell you.
This car has a lot of problems. A lot...
Oh, God! It's in my mouth!
Are you okay? I got Wetnaps.
translation.zh:
你没事吧？
给你洁面巾！

translation.en: I got Wetnaps for your face. Hold on.
I... I'm so sorry.
What are you doing?
You won't give me a day, huh?
You won't give me one day in college?
I'm sorry, Sam,
but the last fragment of the AllSpark was stolen.
translation.zh: 但火种源碎片还是被偷了

translation.en: Like what? Like Decepticons stole it?
We placed it under human protection at your government's request,
translation.zh: 我们将碎片交给人类政府保管

translation.en: but I'm here for your help, Sam,
translation.zh: 但我需要你的帮助 山姆

translation.en: because your leaders believe
we brought vengeance upon your planet.
Perhaps they are right.
That is why they must be reminded
translation.zh: 但还是要有双方都信任的人

translation.en: by another human of the trust we share.
This isn't my war.
Not yet... but I fear it soon will be.
translation.zh:
是还没有
但很快就会有了

translation.en: Your world must not share the same fate as Cybertron.
translation.zh: 地球不能像塞伯坦星球那样

translation.en: Whole generations lost.
I know, and I want to help you, I do,
but I am not some alien ambassador, you know?
translation.zh: 但我不是你们驻地球的大使 我只是个普通人

translation.en: I'm a normal kid with normal problems.
I am where I'm supposed to be.
I'm sorry. I...
-I really am. -Sam, fate rarely calls
translation.zh:
-我帮不了你
-山姆 自己才能…

translation.en: upon us at a moment of our choosing.
You're Optimus Prime. You don't need me.
translation.zh: 你是无敌的擎天柱 哪会需要我

translation.en: We do, more than you know.
translation.zh: 需要 只是你不知道而已

translation.en: U.S.S. TOPEKA, SSN - 754 ON RADIO: Conn, Sonar.
Gained new contact, bearing 214, and possible hostile,
confirmed for Project Deep Six Drop Point.
translation.zh: 确认物体为六个深水投掷物

translation.en: What do you got?
SU pulled five contacts at 5,000 feet,
diving fast.
Never seen anything dive that deep that fast.
translation.zh: 从没见过下潜这么快的

translation.en: Man battle stations.
Chief of the watch, man battle stations.
translation.zh: 传令 进入战斗位置

translation.en: Helm, left full rudder, all ahead two-thirds.
translation.zh: 左满舵 速度三分之二

translation.en: Left full rudder, two-thirds.
translation.zh: 左满舵 速度三分之二

translation.en: CHIEF: Dive, go deep.
The nets protecting NBE One are screaming, sir.
translation.zh: 侦测到从威震天那发出的声波

translation.en: That is 9,300 fathoms down.
translation.zh: 那里深达九千三百英尺

translation.en: And no confirmed DSRVs on site?
-None, sir. -Then we've got a problem.
translation.zh:
-没有 长官
-各位 麻烦大了

translation.en: Need parts. Kill the little one.
translation.zh:
需要零件
拆掉最小的那个

translation.en: The shard make Energon.
translation.zh: 碎片的能量能让他复活

translation.en: Conn, Sonar. Now hold six contacts, and they're coming up fast.
translation.zh: 侦测到六个敌人快速靠近

translation.en: Sound collision alarm.
SOLDIER: Left hard rudder.
Five hundred feet.
Angel Six, we got six hostiles coming up.
translation.zh:
我们离开这里
天使六号 有六个敌人进犯

translation.en: Collision imminent port side.
One hundred feet.
Brace for impact.
Starscream, I'm home.
Lord Megatron, I was so relieved to hear of your resurrection.
translation.zh:
威震天殿下 看到您无恙
我就放心了

translation.en: You left me to die on that pathetic insect planet.
translation.zh: 你竟把我扔在那见死不救！

translation.en: Only to help spawn our new army. The Fallen decrees it!
translation.zh:
不 我是在扩充新的队伍
降临者也很生气

translation.en: After all, in your absence,
someone had to take command.
So disappointing.
Hatchlings. Hatchlings. Careful, fragile!
translation.zh: 小心 新生的 易碎

translation.en: Even in death, there is no command but mine.
translation.zh: 就是我死了 你也别想发号施令

translation.en: My master, I failed you on Earth.
translation.zh: 我的主人 我辜负了您

translation.en: The AllSpark is destroyed and without it, our race will perish.
translation.zh:
火种源被摧毁了
没有它 我们的种族迟早灭亡

translation.en: You have much to learn, my disciple.
translation.zh: 你还有很多要学 我的傻徒弟

translation.en: The Cube was merely a vessel.
Its power, its knowledge, can never be destroyed.
translation.zh: 它的能量和真谛不会被摧毁

translation.en: It can only transform.
translation.zh: 只不过变换了形态 这怎么可能？

translation.en: How is that possible?
It has been absorbed by the human child.
translation.zh: 方块的能量已被那男孩吸收

translation.en: The key to saving our race now lies within his mind.
translation.zh: 能量和真谛就在他的大脑里

translation.en: Well, then, let me strip the very flesh from his body.
translation.zh: 我要生生拿出他的大脑

translation.en: And you will, my apprentice, in time.
translation.zh: 你会的 我的徒弟 迟早会的

translation.en: For millennia, I have dreamed of my return to that wretched planet
translation.zh:
千年以来 我一直梦想着能够回到
那个毁灭的星球

translation.en: where I, too, was once betrayed
translation.zh: 那时我与至尊情同手足

translation.en: by the Primes I called my brothers.
translation.zh: 可是他们竟然背叛了我

translation.en: Only a Prime can defeat me, and now, only one remains.
translation.zh:
只有至尊才能打败我
但是现在只剩一个至尊

translation.en: Optimus! He protects the boy.
translation.zh: 擎天柱 是他在保护那个男孩

translation.en: Then the boy will lead us to him
translation.zh: 那个男孩可以让我们找到他

translation.en: and revenge will be ours.
Yes.
The boy will not escape us.
We have him in our sights.
translation.zh: 一直都在我们的监视下

translation.en: Without more Energon,
the hatchlings will keep dying.
Space. Time. Gravity.
Thank you.
Finish that for me.
We're going on a journey together, you and I, today.
translation.zh: 今天我和你们将展开一段旅程

translation.en: All you eager, nubile, young minds
on the very cusp of adulthood.
And I shall be your consort, your guide,
your chaperone, into the heart of darkness.
Welcome to Astronomy 101.
For what do we know about the stars?
translation.zh: 我们对星星的了解有多少？

translation.en: Virgo, the virgin.
Orion, the great hunter.
These are no mere twinkling diamonds
translation.zh: 但它们都不像闪耀的钻石

translation.en: for lovely maidens to wish upon.
translation.zh: 能让纯情少女们日思夜想

translation.en: No, they are dynamos
translation.zh: 它们产生的能量大的惊人

translation.en: filled with a throbbing, savage and pent-up energy.
translation.zh: 随时要喷薄爆发出能量

translation.en: Behold the work of Albert Einstein, a professor once, like moi.
translation.zh:
来看看亚伯特爱因斯坦
那位曾和我一样的老教授的理论

translation.en: -Energy equals mass... -What you doing?
translation.zh:
-能量等于质量乘以…
-你在干什么？

translation.en: LEO: Put your hand down. Put your hand down.
Young man, there are no questions
until I've reached the climax of my lecture.
translation.zh: 到课堂高潮的时候才能提问

translation.en: I just finished your book and there's a problem. Einstein's wrong.
translation.zh:
我看完您的书
发现爱因斯坦错了

translation.en: Energy does equal mass times the velocity
translation.zh:
维空间的能量等于
质量乘以速度的平方

translation.en: of light squared in this dimension, but what about the other 17?
translation.zh:
维空间的能量等于
质量乘以速度的平方 那十七维空间呢？

translation.en: We haven't even talked about the other 17.
Clear example.
Break down the elemental components of Energon,
assume a constant decay rate and extrapolate for each of the...
translation.zh: 并假定一个常量的衰减速率

translation.en: Fourteen galactic convergences it took
the Sentinel Prime expedition to receive an... Echo on its signal,
translation.zh:
那些领导者反射的信号
就能为交互空间

translation.en: you wind up with a formula for inter-dimensional energy increase
translation.zh: 能量发生得出一个公式

translation.en: that mass and light alone can't possibly explain.
translation.zh: 质量和光速不可能如此解释

translation.en: Come on, guys, I can't be the only one in the class who...
translation.zh: 大家都说说 没有人同意我吗？

translation.en: Young man, I will not be punk'd in front of the Dean.
translation.zh: 你不能当着系主任面前羞辱我

translation.en: No, this is my universe here.
translation.zh: 听好 这里我说了算

translation.en: Do you understand? I am the alpha and the omega.
-Get out of my class. -Yes, sir.
Anyone else care to have some sort of mental breakdown?
translation.zh: 各位 还有谁想当堂精神崩溃？

translation.en: Hi, Bones! Hi. Hi. Oh, you're such a good boy.
translation.zh: 大骨头 真是个乖孩子！

translation.en: (DISTORTED) What a good boy, you are.
Hey, Bones. Are you hungry?
Come on, check that out.
There you go.
-Yes, Samuel? -Hello? Mikaela?
I can't believe you're gonna stand me up
on our first web chat date.
Something just happened to me, okay?
What, you finally hit puberty?
No, no, no. Stop laughing. This is serious. Okay.
translation.zh: 不是 别开玩笑 说真的

translation.en: Remember I was telling you about my great-great-grandfather,
translation.zh: 我提到过我的曾曾曾祖父

translation.en: Archibald Witwicky? Remember?
translation.zh:
阿奇博维特维奇？
记得吗？

translation.en: Watch it, watch it, watch... No!
Okay, remember how I was telling you...
Okay. Can you stop? Watch the foot. Watch your foot.
translation.zh: 给我看着点 别踩着！

translation.en: Mikaela, okay, my great-great-grandfather
went on this Arctic mission, right?
And he saw Megatron. Megatron zapped him,
and he started seeing these crazy symbols. Okay.
translation.zh: 就开始看到疯狂的符号

translation.en: Well, now I'm seeing them, too. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 现在我也看到了 对不起

translation.en: I just read a 903-page astronomy book in 32.6 seconds.
translation.zh: 我用32.6秒看完903页天文课本

translation.en: I had a meltdown in the middle of my class.
translation.zh: 我在课堂上精神失常得一塌糊涂

translation.en: I am seeing symbols ever since I...
translation.zh: 我看到符号了 自从我…

translation.en: Since what?
Ever since I touched the Cube splinter.
Do you have it?
MIKAELA: Yeah, I have it.
It's in the shop safe. It's fine.
Mikaela, do not touch it, okay?
translation.zh: 米吉拉 不要碰它好吗？

translation.en: -Don't touch it. -I'm not gonna touch it.
Sam, it's fine. It's locked away.
No one knows where it is.
WHEELIE: I do.
You're hot, but you ain't too bright.
There we go. Yeah, that'll work.
Ow! Damn it! Son of a bitch!
What are you looking at, slobber puss?
What the... This place is a freaking house of horrors.
translation.zh:
又怎么了
这地方简直太可怕了

translation.en: Pain... It hurts...
Hold on.
Right to five, then...
Is that the best you got, huh?
translation.zh: 就这么点能耐吗？ 就这么点能耐吗？

translation.en: Is that the best you can do?
What are you doing here, you little freak?
Ow! That's my eye, you crazy bitch!
You gonna talk now?
I seek knowledge from the Cube.
translation.zh:
降临者叫我找… -方块里的真谛
-什么真谛？

translation.en: -The Fallen demands me! -What knowledge?
You got the shard, I need the shard.
Give me the shard. I need the shard.
translation.zh: 把它给我 给我碎片

translation.en: I'm gonna be dead without that shard.
translation.zh: 我拿不到碎片他们会杀了我

translation.en: Easy, warrior goddess, I'm just a little salvage-scrap drone.
translation.zh:
轻点 美女小战士
我只是替人卖命的小角色

translation.en: And I'm your worst nightmare.
Hey, hey, hey.
-What the hell was that? -I'll tell you later,
just not on an open phone line, okay?
I'm gonna get on a plane right now
and I'll be there later this afternoon. Just be careful, Sam.
translation.zh:
我现在去机场 今天下午就到了
小心点 山姆

translation.en: And have any strangers given you
anything suspicious to carry on today?
WHEELIE: Yeah, a live bomb!
-No. -Good.
Major, incoming SOS from Autobots!
translation.zh: 少校 汽车人的求救信号

translation.en: Multiple Decepticon contacts in motion.
translation.zh: 数个霸天虎变形金刚开始行动

translation.en: Vicinity, eastern United States, sir.
translation.zh: 正接近美国东部 长官

translation.en: As in how many?
Unclear, sir.
Well, get clear.
The Autobots are on the move,
splitting into two teams, sir.
They're not answering our calls
and they're heading to New York and Philadelphia.
Full weapons deployment. Wheels up in 20 minutes!
translation.zh: 全副武装 二十分钟后起飞！

translation.en: Move it!
Let's go!
PILOT ON PA: Flight 57, welcome to Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 这是57次航班 欢迎来到费城

translation.en: LEO: Alicia, mi amor,
can I interest you in an 18-inch Zookeeper's special?
Extra-large, triple cheese, with every known animal as a topping.
translation.zh: 奶酪加大三倍 每种肉都有

translation.en: Basically, I've got, like, 18 inches of meat.
Unless you're vegetarian. All right. It's cool. I am, too.
translation.zh: 你要是素食者那就算了

translation.en: -Sam home? -Sam? I think he died,
but why don't we check?
-Here we are. -SAM: Hey.
You ever have a song stuck in your head? It's like
translation.zh: 有时脑里总是反复放同一首歌

translation.en: the worst song ever, but you can't help to whistle it or sing it
translation.zh: 很难听 但你却忍不住一直哼

translation.en: 'cause it, like, repeats itself, repeats itself,
repeats itself, repeats itself?
Kitten calendar, kitten calendar, kitten calendar,
-kitten calendar... -Dude, what the eff?
I know you're freaking out. Don't freak out. Don't freak out.
translation.zh: 我知道你要崩溃 别崩溃

translation.en: Easy fix. Puzzle code in my head.
Now it's on the walls. Everything is good.
translation.zh:
代码都写在墙上呢
多棒啊

translation.en: This is the part that...
Okay, what were you saying?
Alice, I'm horrified you had to see this. Let's go.
translation.zh: 爱丽丝抱歉吓着你了 走吧

translation.en: ALICE: Get out.
Wait, wait, wait! Can I just sit and watch?
I'll... I'll eat my pizza quietly.
translation.zh: 我不说话 我吃匹萨

translation.en: Sam, I knew there was something special about you.
translation.zh: 山姆 我就知道你有异人之处

translation.en: Really?
And I know you know what happens
when two people in the know get together.
translation.zh: 我们同处一室会发生什么？

translation.en: They're genuinely amazing in bed.
Thank you.
All right, listen, hold on! Boundaries.
translation.zh: 好吧 等等 注意 别越轨

translation.en: Flag on the play. Okay. I'm very ticklish.
We have needs, Sam. Relax.
translation.zh: 我很怕痒 我们都有需要 放轻松！

translation.en: Jeez!
What about this economy? It's crazy, isn't it?
translation.zh: 聊聊金融危机 挺刺激 对吧？

translation.en: You are very aggressive.
Just relax.
You want some turkey meatloaf?
Sam?
Mikaela!
Is that your girlfriend?
-Mmm-hmm. -Ex.
Mikaela! Wait!
I can explain...
Sam, your bed buddy, Alice...
translation.zh: 山姆 你朋友 爱丽丝

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
All right, come on. She's coming.
She's an alien robot. You gotta move.
-LEO: Is this real? -Just run.
Oh, my God! Oh, my God! I can't believe
I almost had sex with her in my dream!
I can tell that you really missed me a lot, Sam.
translation.zh: 你还真想我啊 山姆

translation.en: -Look, it's not my fault, okay? -It's not your fault?
Listen! Listen, I'm a victim.
-You were a victim? Of what? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 哦 你是受害人？受什么害？

translation.en: -Of what, little 80-pound girl? -Of... Of molestation.
It was like getting humped in the neck by a mountain ox.
translation.zh: 就像被头野牛骚扰了一样

translation.en: You didn't have to put your tongue in her mouth.
translation.zh: 你不该把舌头放她嘴里

translation.en: -I didn't! Look! -You did!
You ever had your stomach tongued by
a mountain ox with a five-foot tongue?
It's not fun for me, okay, Mikaela?
And it smelled like... Like diesel!
Like a diesel-y tinge to it.
You're such a little girl.
We're gonna have 10 seconds of silence right now.
I'm not talking to you for 10 seconds.
You can't give me the silent treatment! You know what?
I'm not talking to you for 10 seconds. You have three seconds left.
translation.zh: 十秒内不和你说话 还剩三秒

translation.en: You know what? You can give me the silent treatment
translation.zh: 听着 你想不说可以不说

translation.en: all you want, but you can't keep me from talking.
-What were you gonna say? -I hope you had a lot of fun,
because this, this is over.
She violated your orifice with her nasty alien probe?
translation.zh: 她把脏舌头伸进你嘴里了？

translation.en: She did it? She went in there?
All her little embryo alien babies are gestating and hatching inside of you.
translation.zh: 那你肚子里就会有小外星人了

translation.en: They're growing right now, probably.
You need to vomit it right now.
Yak it. Yak it right now.
-Who are you? -Leonardo Ponce De Leon Spitz.
translation.zh:
-你是谁？
-我是著名的李奥纳多

translation.en: Okay? I'm the key to this.
The aliens, they want me 'cause of my site.
translation.zh: 外星人因为我的网站找我

translation.en: Whoa, guys, right there.
SAM: Run.
Mikaela!
Come on. We gotta move.
MALE STUDENT: It's a bomb!
You've got to get that box.
This way.
WHEELIE: What? Hey. Let me out, let me out.
translation.zh: 我被关住了 快让我出来

translation.en: Oh, my God, you know how to hot-wire a car? That's so hot.
translation.zh:
天啊 你还会这么点火？
真性感

translation.en: Drive, drive, drive. She's right there. She's right there!
translation.zh:
快开
快 她来了！

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on.
Go! Go! Go! Back up the car.
Now.
Tongue.
Oh, my God!
Kiss this, bitch!
SAM: Drive, drive, drive.
Okay, so what else don't I know, all right?
Since you guys forgot to mention some minor details.
That thing you saw back there, that was the little baby...
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
Sam!
Sam!
-Sam! -LEO: Hold on!
-SAM: Pull me up. -Hold on!
MIKAELA: Sam, get back in!
LEO: I don't want to die. We're gonna die. Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我不想死！妈呀！我快死了！

translation.en: Jesus! Jesus!
Come here, boy.
Closer.
-Oh, my God. -SAM: Okay.
MEGATRON: You remember me, don't you?
I did what you said, okay? Just don't hurt us.
translation.zh: 我照你说的做了 别害我们

translation.en: Shut up!
Sam!
MEGATRON: Yeah. Yes, yes.
It feels good to grab your flesh.
I am going to kill you slowly, painfully,
translation.zh:
我要宰了你
慢慢地 让你尝尽苦头

translation.en: but first, we have some delicate work to do.
translation.zh: 但首先 我们要做些重要事

translation.en: MEGATRON: How I could snap your limbs off.
translation.zh: 怎么才能把你拆成碎片

translation.en: Doctor, examine this alien specimen.
translation.zh: 医生 检查这个外星异类

translation.en: I'll scan you. Let's take a look at your face.
translation.zh: 让我检查一下你的脸部

translation.en: I'm the doctor. The odd job. Information.
translation.zh: 我是医生 给我信息

translation.en: Yeah!
Beseeching my shard.
Easy or tough way?
MEGATRON: There they are.
SAM: That's what I'm seeing in my head.
translation.zh: 我脑子里看到的就是这些

translation.en: MEGATRON: These symbols can lead us to the Energon source.
translation.zh: 这些符号能带我们去找超能量源

translation.en: DOCTOR: We must have the brain on the table.
translation.zh: 我们要把你的大脑剁掉！

translation.en: -Chop, chop! -Brain?
What does he mean by my brain?
Well, you have something on your mind, something I need.
translation.zh: 你大脑里有东西 我恰恰需要

translation.en: Hold on. I know you're pissed. I know you're pissed
because I tried to kill you and it's completely understandable.
If somebody tried to kill me, I'd be upset, too.
translation.zh: 有人想杀我 我也会生气

translation.en: I think that we have an opportunity here
to start anew and develop our relationship
and see where it leads us, okay?
So, you just call Doctor Inspector off
and let's just talk for five seconds.
Wait, wait, wait!
LEO: Come on! Go, go!
MIKAELA: Sam!
Go, go, go!
OPTIMUS: Sam!
LEO: Run!
Go, go, go, go!
SAM: Here he comes.
OPTIMUS: Hide, Sam.
Weak.
Puny. Waste of metal.
Junkyard crap.
MEGATRON: Decepticons.
Come here, boy.
MEGATRON: There is another source of Energon hidden on this planet.
The boy could lead us to it.
Optimus!
MEGATRON: Is the future of our race
not worth a single human life?
Up. Get up!
You'll never stop at one.
translation.zh: 起来！ 你不可能杀了一个就罢手！

translation.en: I'll take you all on.
Piece of tin.
Sam! Where are you?
No!
MEGATRON: You're so weak
The last Prime is dead.
Sam, run. Run.
IRONHIDE: Autobots, attack!
Bumblebee, get them out of here.
translation.zh: 大黄蜂 快离开这里！

translation.en: This is Lennox.
MEGATRON: That went well.
STARSCREAM: We've lost the boy, Master.
The Autobots must be shielding their signals.
translation.zh: 汽车人一定在阻截信号

translation.en: I can't even rely on you to swat a simple insect?
translation.zh: 靠你宰一只虫都办不到！

translation.en: One insect among seven billion.
MEGATRON: Shut up.
He could be anywhere.
Then we will force them to find him for us.
It's time for the world to know of our presence.
No more disguises. No mercy.
The time has come for my master's arrival.
Decepticons, mobilize. It is time.
translation.zh: 霸天虎总动员 决战时刻到！

translation.en: JUDY: Speaking French is so exciting.
Oh, God, who is this?
Hello? I mean, bonsoir!
What? Who is this?
SOUNDWAVE: Where is the boy?
For Pete's sakes. I'm not impressed
with your perverted mouth-breathing.
Jeez!
You are invading my space. I'm gonna have to drop you.
translation.zh: 你侵犯我的个人空间 我打你哟！

translation.en: Would you get out of here?
RON: I didn't come all the way across the ocean to eat a plate of snails.
translation.zh:
我漂洋过海来这里
又不是来吃蜗牛的 我喜欢试新鲜事物

translation.en: I want to try new things.
Looks like Canadian goose poop.
It's nasty.
Revenge is mine.
Yeah!
FEMALE ANNOUNCER: ...definitely not a plane...
MORSHOWER: Look, carriers don't just sink.
...a horrible accident or a terrorist attack or worse...
translation.zh:
恐怖事件 恐怖份子袭击
或者其他什么糟糕的事件

translation.en: Negative. NORAD confirmed,
translation.zh: 北美防空联合总部证实

translation.en: projectile came from beyond our atmosphere,
inbound at 30,000 knots.
(STATIC HISSING) Citizens of the human hive,
your leaders have withheld the truth.
translation.zh: 你们的领袖在隐藏真相

translation.en: You are not alone in this universe.
translation.zh: 你们在宇宙中并非独存

translation.en: We have lived among you, hidden,
but no more.
As you've seen, we can destroy your cities at will,
translation.zh:
大家看到了
我们可以随意摧毁你们的城市

translation.en: unless you turn over this boy.
translation.zh: 除非你们乖乖就范 交出一个青年

translation.en: If you resist us, we will destroy the world as you know it.
translation.zh:
如果抵抗
我们将摧毁你们的世界

translation.en: MALE ANNOUNCER 1: What we're hearing from the German government
translation.zh: 德国政府表示 这段讲话是

translation.en: is that the world broadcast was a satellite hacking.
translation.zh: 透过非法入侵卫星得以播出

translation.en: MALE ANNOUNCER 2: The military
has just told us they have assumed Condition Delta,
translation.zh: 安全防御级别已提升到三级

translation.en: which is the highest level we have been at since 9/11.
translation.zh: 是911事件以来的最高级别

translation.en: President Obama is being flown to a bunker
somewhere in the middle of the United States
in the face of the worst simultaneous
attacks ever around the globe.
The aircraft carrier USS Roosevelt
translation.zh: 航母罗斯福号东海岸沉没

translation.en: goes down off the East Coast, all hands lost.
Worldwide casualties are in the neighborhood of 7,000,
translation.zh: 目前伤亡人数大约在七千人

translation.en: but that number could climb.
It's still too early to tell.
translation.zh: 实际伤亡人数尚无法确定

translation.en: What we need to ask now is, "Who and why?"
translation.zh:
我们要问的是 这是谁
为何要这样做？

translation.en: MALE ANNOUNCER 3: The FBI is still trying to locate the boy, Sam Witwicky.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局正在找一名叫山姆的青年

translation.en: We believe they have information about the attacks.
translation.zh: 他们也许有袭击的消息

translation.en: The FBI, CIA and Interpol
translation.zh: 调查局 中情局和国际刑警

translation.en: are all seeking the cooperation of worldwide law enforcement.
LEO: You need to listen to this, man. You gotta check this out.
MALE ANNOUNCER 4: They have a traffic-camera spotting...
translation.zh: 只要他们有交通摄相机

translation.en: They have a picture of me, man. We're dead, bro.
translation.zh: 他们有我的照片 我完了！

translation.en: FBI, CIA, we are wanted fugitives now.
I just need you to focus for one minute, man.
-Just stop. -This thing has blown up
to a whole other level, all right?
translation.zh: 整个事件的性质升级了 对吧？

translation.en: Give me this thing. They can track us.
translation.zh: 这个给我 他们能追到我们

translation.en: -Do you see this? -What?
They can track us? Like, satellite track us?
translation.zh:
能追踪我们？
好像卫星追踪？

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Okay, I'm not even with you guys!
Technically, I'm like a hostage. This is kidnapping...
translation.zh: 严格来讲 我是个人质

translation.en: -Enough is... -MUDFLAP: Yo, Leo!
This thing's gonna give me a heart attack, I swear.
That's 'cause you is a wuss.
You guys forced me into that car, right?
I think he's scared.
Hey, Mudflap, what are we gonna do with this shrimp taco?
Let's pop a cap in his ass, throw him in the trunk
translation.zh: 一枪打死他 然后丢进后车箱

translation.en: and then nobody gonna know nothing, know what I mean?
-Not in my trunk. -Bumper cars? I'm hearing you.
translation.zh: 碰碰车 我全都听到了

translation.en: Okay? I'm right here and I can hear you.
No one's popping any caps in any asses, okay?
translation.zh:
我就在这儿 你们不会开枪
也不会毁尸灭迹 好吧？

translation.en: I've had a hell of a day.
Why don't you get a haircut with your bitch ass?
translation.zh: 我今天够倒霉了 该去剪剪头发啦！

translation.en: Go whine to your boyfriend.
Listen, Sam, I know what I'm gonna do, man.
translation.zh: 山姆 这就是我要做的

translation.en: Go to the authorities and tell them the truth.
translation.zh:
听着 我会去找政府
说明真相

translation.en: I had nothing to do with this.
Hey, you wanted this, right?
You wanted the real deal? That's what this is.
Wake up. You're in the middle of it!
You want to run? Go ahead! No one's stopping you.
Stop complaining.
RATCHET: What is the meaning of this?
You dare point a gun at me?
You want a piece of me? I will tear you apart!
translation.zh: 你想跟我较量？我把你撕碎

translation.en: Drop your weapons! Drop your weapons!
-Tell them to lower their weapons. -Tell them first.
translation.zh: 命他们放下武器！ 让它们先放

translation.en: Tell them to lower their weapons.
Major, there's nothing I can do. Talk to him.
Your NEST team is deactivated, Major.
You are to cease anti-Decepticon operations
translation.zh: 立刻停止与霸天虎交火

translation.en: and return to Diego Garcia pending further orders.
No, we take our orders directly from Chairman Morshower, sir.
Well, I'll see your Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff
and I will raise you a President of the United States.
I have operational command now.
An alien blood feud has been brought to our shores
for which our soldiers are paying the price.
The secret is out.
This is our war now and we will win it as we always have,
with a coordinated military strategy.
This fool is terribly misinformed.
You're gonna need every asset that you've got.
What we need is to draw up battle plans
while we explore every possible diplomatic solution.
Like what, handing over the kid?
translation.zh: 好像什么？把山姆交出来？

translation.en: All options are being considered.
translation.zh: 所有的办法都考虑过了

translation.en: Whatever the Decepticons are after, this is just the start.
translation.zh: 无论霸天虎想要什么 这只是开始

translation.en: There is no negotiating with them.
I'm ordering you to stand down.
You won't be needing this anymore.
Get your assets back to base.
And take that pile of scrap metal back to Diego Garcia.
translation.zh: 带着那堆废铁滚回迭戈加西亚！

translation.en: Let's go.
I really don't like that dude. He's an asshole.
translation.zh: 那家伙真讨厌 混球一个！

translation.en: MAN ON PA: Autobots, report to hangar for transport.
translation.zh: 汽车人 到机库报到准备出发

translation.en: Ironhide, we should leave this planet.
translation.zh: 铁皮 我们马上离开地球

translation.en: That's not what Optimus would want.
translation.zh: 这不是擎天柱所希望的

translation.en: There's nothing that you could have done.
-You okay? -Yeah.
Bee, if you hate me, I understand.
translation.zh: 阿蜂 你要是恨我 我能理解

translation.en: I messed up. I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
都怪我闯祸
对不起

translation.en: Young fella, you are the person I care about most in my life.
translation.zh: 年轻人…你是…我最关心的人

translation.en: If there's anything you need, I won't be far away.
translation.zh: 如果有事 我在你近旁

translation.en: He's dead because of me.
He came here to protect me and he's dead.
translation.zh: 他保护了我 可他却死了

translation.en: There's some things you just can't change.
So, his sacrifice for us would not have been in vain. Hallelujah!
translation.zh: 我们一定要团结 他的血才不会白流

translation.en: I'm gonna make it right. I'm going to turn myself in.
We... We've got to stick together.
You're not going to do that.
Yes, I am.
BUMBLEBEE: Everything we worked for will be wiped out in one day
translation.zh: 我们所做的一切有一天都会消失

translation.en: -You two... -BOTH: Huh?
Hey, you know the glyphs?
These? The symbols that have been rattling around in my head?
That's old school, yo. That's, like... That's Cybertronian.
translation.zh: 老玩意了 就好像塞伯坦文

translation.en: That's some serious stuff, right there.
They gotta mean something, like a message or like a map.
translation.zh:
这肯定有什么含义
比如信息、地图！

translation.en: Like a map to an Energon source.
Can you read this?
Read? No. We don't really do much reading. Not so much.
If you can't read it, we gotta find somebody who can.
Look who came sashaying back.
Hair growing like a Chia Pet. Look at him.
I had a bit of a mild panic attack earlier, right?
That's 'cause you're a pussy.
I think I'm allowed that, considering what I've been through.
I heard you have a problem.
I think I know someone who can help.
-Who? -Robo-Warrior.
LEO: This guy, Robo-Warrior,
everything about anything alien, he's supposed to know.
One time we revenge-hacked his site
translation.zh: 一次我们打入他的网站

translation.en: and maybe I saw some of your alien drawings or whatever.
translation.zh: 也许我看到你的外星人图画

translation.en: This is it. Yep.
-Deli. -Good front
translation.zh: 就这里 熟食店是绝佳掩护

translation.en: All right, wait here. I'll give you the go/no go. All right?
Number 42, we got your kishka, knish,
kasha-varnishka and kreplach combo right here.
translation.zh: 42号点了香肠 土豆饼和鸡杂拌意粉

translation.en: Cash only. Who's next?
I told you to cure the lox in the brine and then smoke it.
translation.zh: 叫你先用盐水泡了再熏

translation.en: Ma, you want me to cut my hand off, or what?
translation.zh: 妈 你想叫我把手割掉？

translation.en: You... You ruined a beautiful piece of fish, you retard!
translation.zh: 妈 你想叫我把手割掉？ 鱼被你糟蹋了

translation.en: I'm like a ninja with a blade. It's an art form.
Give me your money. Get out of here.
Hey, Sal. Watch your reach, huh?
Take a number, young man.
Robo-Warrior.
Know him?
I never heard of him.
You never heard of TheRealEffingDeal.com?
You must be talking about that amateur-hour blog operation
translation.zh: 你说的是小孩子玩的… 业余博客玩意儿吧

translation.en: with Game Boy-level security.
Robo-Warrior.
It's him. It's him. That's the guy right there. That's him.
No.
You got to be kidding me.
All right, meat store's closed. Everybody out. Out, right now.
translation.zh: 肉店关门了 大家都出去！

translation.en: WOMAN: When he says to go, you go.
That means you, lady, right now.
Wait a minute. You know this guy?
-We're old friends. -Old friends?
You're the case that shut down Sector Seven,
got the kibosh, disbanded.
No more security clearance, no retirement, no nothing.
translation.zh: 保险退休金全无 两手空空

translation.en: All 'cause of you and your little criminal girlfriend.
translation.zh: 保险退休金全无 两手空空 都怪你和罪犯女友！

translation.en: Look at her now, so mature.
Moron. Where's the whitefish?
Hey! Don't touch me with the pig.
-SIMMONS: Yakov. -What?
You don't get Christmas bonuses standing around.
translation.zh: 再傻站着年终奖金取消

translation.en: You want those new teeth you saw on SkyMall?
It's my dream.
Help her out.
-You live with your mama? -No, my mama lives with me.
translation.zh:
-你跟你妈住？
-不对 她跟我住

translation.en: It's a big difference. They got your face all over the news,alien boy.
translation.zh:
-你跟你妈住？
-不对 她跟我住 区别太大
你们当新闻明星了

translation.en: -Yeah, I know. -And NBE One's still kicking?
How did that happen? Don't answer.
I don't know what you're hiding,
but I don't want anything to do with it.
So, good-bye. You never saw me. I got bagels to schmear. Vanish.
Can you give me five seconds? Look, hold on, I need your help.
translation.zh: 能不能给我五秒？求你帮忙

translation.en: Really? You need my help?
I need... Look, I am slowly losing my mind.
translation.zh: 我快疯了 我脑里被…

translation.en: Okay, I had a little crab-bot,
plunged a device deep into the soft tissues of my brain
and started projecting little alien
symbols like a freaking home movie.
And on top of that, I'm a wanted fugitive.
So, you think you got it rough?
You said it projected images off your brain?
translation.zh: 你脑子里能投影出符号？

translation.en: Right.
Meat locker, now.
LEO: Dead pigs. MIKAELA: Yuck.
What you're about to see is top secret.
Do not tell my mother.
LEO: Swine flu. Not good. SIMMONS: Now you know.
translation.zh:
-死猪 猪流感 不好
-现在懂了

translation.en: Next time you eat a goat or a pig, there's a story behind it.
translation.zh: 下次吃肉的时候 想想背后的故事

translation.en: Sad little story.
TV: An entire city flat. How do you explain that?
Are you saying you believe in aliens?
SIMMONS: Okay, files, files.
We're talking about symbols.
Hey, still radioactive. Hands off.
Okay, Cube-brain.
Any of these look like the symbols you saw?
translation.zh: 像不像你看到的符号？ 你从哪儿弄到的？

translation.en: Where'd you get these?
Before I got fired, I poached S-7's crown jewel,
translation.zh: 我被炒前 打入第七部的绝密文档 75年研究外星人

translation.en: over 75 years of alien research,
which points to one inescapable fact.
The Transformers, they've been here a long, long time.
How do I know?
Archeologists found these unexplained markings
in ancient ruins all over the world.
China. Egypt. Greece.
translation.zh: 中国 埃及 希腊

translation.en: Shot in 1932.
These the symbols you're seeing in your head?
Yeah.
Same ones over here, right?
So, tell me, how did they end up all drawing the same things?
translation.zh: 他们画的东西怎么都差不多？

translation.en: Aliens. And I think some of them stayed.
translation.zh:
外星人
我认为他们有的从没离开过

translation.en: Check this out. Project Black Knife.
translation.zh: 看看这个 黑刀计划

translation.en: Robots in disguise, hiding here all along.
translation.zh:
伪装的机器人
一直躲在这里 我们在全国发现了这种放射符号

translation.en: We detected radioactive signatures all across the country.
translation.zh: 我们在全国发现了这种放射符号

translation.en: I pleaded on my knees with S-7 to investigate it,
translation.zh: 我跪求第七部展开调查

translation.en: but they said the readings were infinitesimal,
that I was obsessed.
Me. Can you imagine that?
Yeah. Megatron said that
there was another Energon source here.
-On Earth. Another source? -On Earth.
Okay? And that these symbols, maps in my head, would lead him there.
You talk to your Autobot friends about this?
translation.zh: 你问了汽车人朋友没有？

translation.en: No, no, no, the source is before them.
Whatever the Energon source is,
it predates them. It's before them.
-So, it comes before them. -Correct.
Well, then we're porked, unless we can talk to a Decepticon.
translation.zh: 我们完蛋了 除非能找个霸天虎来谈谈

translation.en: I mean, I'm not on speaking terms with them.
Actually, I am.
WHEELIE: Let me out.
This is going to be a little bit sad.
I will have so many Decepticons on your butt.
Hey, behave.
-What is it, a Decepticon? -Yeah.
-And you're training him? -I'm trying to.
I spent my whole adult life combing the planet for aliens,
translation.zh: 我一辈子都在地球上找外星人

translation.en: and you're carrying around one
in your purse like a little Chihuahua.
Do you want a throwdown, you pubic 'fro-head?
translation.zh: 想跟我打架 卷毛头？

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry about your eye, you know,
translation.zh: 对不起 抱歉弄坏你的眼睛

translation.en: but, if you're a good boy, then I'm not gonna torch your other eye.
translation.zh:
你乖乖的
我就不会弄你另一只眼睛

translation.en: Okay? I'm not gonna torch it.
translation.zh: 好不好？我不会拿喷枪烧你

translation.en: Just tell me what these symbols are, please.
translation.zh:
告诉我们这些符号是什么意思
好吧

translation.en: All right. I know that. That's the language of the Primes.
translation.zh: 我知道 那是汽车人的语言

translation.en: I don't read it, but these guys...
translation.zh: 我不会认 但那些人

translation.en: Where the frick did you find photos of these guys?
translation.zh: 这些照片从哪里弄到的？

translation.en: -Is this they? -Yeah. Seekers, pal.
Oldest of the old.
They've been here thousands of years,
looking for something. I don't know what.
translation.zh: 找东西 不知找什么

translation.en: Nobody tells me nothing, but they'll translate those symbols for you.
translation.zh:
找什么也没有人告诉我
他们了解这些符号

translation.en: And I know where to find them.
-Show us. -Yeah.
SIMMONS: The closest one's in Washington.
Smithsonian Air and Space Museum. Land of dreams in there.
translation.zh:
史密森航太博物馆
我的梦想

translation.en: All I ever wanted to be was an astronaut.
-SIMMONS: Hold those. -What is that?
What? I wear them when I'm in a funk.
So does Giambi, Jeter. It's a baseball thing. Okay.
translation.zh: 棒球手建比 杰特也一样 球迷都懂

translation.en: Watches synchronized, sharp mind and empty bladder.
translation.zh: 对表 高度警觉 少上厕所

translation.en: You get caught, demand an attorney and don't ever say my name.
translation.zh: 被抓了上法庭别供出我来

translation.en: Take one of these pills. Slip it under your tongue.
It's the high-concentrate polymer they put in Oreo cookies.
translation.zh: 加进饼干里的高聚合物

translation.en: Tricks the polygraph every time.
Okay. Now, let's get this show on the road.
(BUZZING) Whoa. Whoa!
No, listen, I can't do this.
I'm not some alien bounty hunter, guys.
I'm not gonna do this. Guards have guns. I don't want to die.
translation.zh: 那些卫兵有枪！我不想死！

translation.en: Kid, kid, kid.
You compromise this mission, you are dead to me.
translation.zh: 你敢临阵脱逃 逃不过我这一关

translation.en: Now look into my eyes and tighten up that sphincter.
GUARD ON PA: The museum is now closing.
Yo, baba! Bad news, bro. Ran out of toilet paper.
You got any out here? Please tell me you do.
Sir. I suggest you get in there. The museum is closed.
translation.zh: 你最好进去 博物馆关门了

translation.en: Listen, man, I understand that,
but as you can see, this is important.
All right? Thumper dumper. I got to go. All right.
GUARD: Sir, you are a grown, naked man around children.
translation.zh: 你这样子到处走…不害矂吗？

translation.en: Pull your pants up and exit the building.
LEO: I'm not going anywhere.
You got that paper, right, sir?
GUARD: You should be embarrassed.
This is a family museum, sir.
What is going on here?
How many times can you get tased
in the nuts before you can't have kids?
You are an amateur, man, a rank amateur.
We just downed five guards. Five guards.
-Get your stuff and get out of here. -Give me a second here.
I got to get the tracker, all right.
Be good.
WHEELIE: I'm claustrophobic.
Look, look. Follow him. Follow him. He knows where he's going.
translation.zh: 看 跟它走 它知道去哪里

translation.en: -He knows something. -What?
He knows something.
-You got what I got? -Yeah.
SIMMONS: Blackbird.
There he is.
This guy's a legend, like the Chairman of the Board!
translation.zh: 这小子是传奇 就像董事主席

translation.en: Yo, freshman, point the shard and watch the magic happen.
translation.zh: 新生 拿出立方体！静观魔术

translation.en: Shit. It's a Decepticon!
-Decepticon? -Decepticon?
Behind the MiG now!
JETFIRE: What sort of hideous mausoleum is this?
Answer me, pawns and knaves.
Show yourselves or suffer my infinite wrath.
translation.zh: 快现身 否则尝我的厉害！

translation.en: You little spinal-cord-based organisms!
Bugger it.
Behold the eternal glory of Jetfire.
translation.zh: 记住我天火的永恒光辉！

translation.en: Prepare for remote systems override
translation.zh: 启动遥控系统 老家伙糊涂了

translation.en: I tell you, this guy did not age well.
I don't think he's gonna hurt us.
I command these doors to open.
Fire! I said, fire!
Bollocks.
Damn these worthless parts.
Wait a second.
Itchy, wretched rust in my arse.
The museum is going to be very angry. Very angry.
We gotta catch that plane.
Right. I'm on a mission.
HUMANS: Wait, wait, wait, wait.
-What do you want? -Look, we just want to talk.
I have no time to talk. I'm on a mission.
translation.zh:
没时间！
我在执行任务！

translation.en: I'm a mercenary doom-bringer. What planet am I on?
-Earth. -Earth?
Terrible name for a planet. Might as well call it "Dirt."
translation.zh:
地球？真是难听
还不如叫土球

translation.en: Planet "Dirt."
Tell me, is that robot civil war still going on?
translation.zh: 告诉我 机器人内战还在进行吗？

translation.en: -Who's winning? -The Decepticons.
Well, I changed sides to the Autobots.
translation.zh: 我弃暗投明加入汽车人了 弃暗投明是什么意思？

translation.en: What do you mean, changed sides?
JETFIRE: It's a choice.
translation.zh: 这是经过激烈思考斗争的选择

translation.en: It's an intensely personal decision.
So much negativity. Who wants to live a life filled with hate?
translation.zh:
消极因素太多
光靠仇恨怎么活啊？

translation.en: You mean you don't have to work
for those miserable, freaking Decepticons?
If Decepticons had their way,
they'd destroy the whole universe.
I'm changing sides. I'm changing sides, too, warrior goddess.
translation.zh: 我也要弃暗投明 女勇士

translation.en: -Who's your little Autobot? -You're cute.
Name's Wheelie. Yeah. Say my name, say my name.
translation.zh: 我叫小轮 叫我的名字嘛！

translation.en: What are you allowing to happen to your foot just now?
At least he's faithful, Sam.
Yeah, well, he's faithful and he's nude
and he's perverted.
Can you just... Can you stop? -Hey, what are you doing? -It's just something
to think about. I won't argue with... What were you saying?
translation.zh: 我不想多罗嗦 你说了些什么？

translation.en: I told you my name was Jetfire, so stop judging me.
translation.zh:
我告诉你我叫天火！
休想裁判我！

translation.en: Somebody shit the bed this morning.
JETFIRE: I have issues of my own.
And it started with my mother.
My ancestors have been here for centuries.
translation.zh: 我的祖先来这好几个世纪了

translation.en: My father, he was a wheel, the first wheel.
translation.zh: 我父亲他是第一代转轮！

translation.en: Do you know what he transformed into?
-No. -Nothing.
But he did so with honor, dignity, damn it.
translation.zh: 但它气质轩昂 不卑不亢！

translation.en: Bollocks. (MUTTERING) My boosters are fried.
I think we can help each other.
You know things I don't know.
I know things you don't know, I do.
I don't think he knows anything. Honestly, I don't.
I could do this all day. It comes in waves, these vivid symbols.
translation.zh:
说实话 我不知道
这些生动的符号

translation.en: They're symbols, but they're in my mind.
translation.zh: 虽说是符号但都记在我脑里

translation.en: You see, all this is in my mind
and Megatron wants what's in my mind.
Him and someone called the Fallen.
The Fallen? I know him.
He left me here to rust. The original Decepticon.
translation.zh:
是它丢我在这里生锈
典型的霸天虎

translation.en: He's terrible to work for. It's always apocalypse, chaos, crisis.
translation.zh:
它可不好惹
满脑子都是毁灭 混乱 危机

translation.en: These transcriptions, they were part of my mission,
translation.zh: 这些符号也是我任务的一部分

translation.en: the Fallen's search.
I remember now, for the Dagger's Tip, and the key.
translation.zh:
我想起来了
要找匕首端和一把钥匙！

translation.en: Slow down. The Dagger's Tip? The key? What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 匕首端？关键？你说些什么？

translation.en: No time to explain. Hold on, everybody. Stay still or you'll die.
translation.zh:
没时间解释了 大家抓牢了！
不坐好就没命了！

translation.en: Well, that wasn't so bad.
I just hope we're still on the right planet.
WHEELIE: Hey, that freaking hurt.
Oh, my God.
Oh, God.
Oh, my God, what a beautiful face.
This would be a perfect moment,
except you landed on my testicles.
translation.zh: 只是你降落在我的蛋蛋上了

translation.en: Please, get off.
(GRUNTS) God, my balls.
MIKAELA: Sam!
Where are we? Simmons!
Hey! Yeah!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God. What is this? It's Vegas.
translation.zh:
天啊
这是什么地方？赌城

translation.en: -SAM: You guys okay? -MIKAELA: Yeah.
LEO: Hey, I think we're in Vegas.
That really, really hurt. You're just lucky that I didn't get hurt!
translation.zh: 痛死我了！真幸运我没受伤！

translation.en: People could have gotten killed, okay?
And if I would have gotten hurt,
-you would have heard... -Shut up.
I told you I was opening a space bridge.
It's the fastest way to travel to Egypt.
When did you... When did you tell us? You didn't tell us anything.
translation.zh: 什么时候说了？你什么都没说啊！

translation.en: You didn't tell us anything. Why are we in Egypt?
translation.zh: 你什么都不说就来埃及干嘛？

translation.en: Don't you get snippy with me, fleshling. You were duly informed.
translation.zh: 你敢对我那么没礼貌 小混蛋

translation.en: Can you just stop for a second? Can you focus?
translation.zh: 先别急 注意力集中！

translation.en: Can you tell us why we're in Egypt
translation.zh:
能否告诉我们
为什么来埃及？

translation.en: so we can all have a little bit of semblance of peace of mind?
translation.zh: 至少让我们都有点心理准备吧？

translation.en: JETFIRE: This planet was visited by our race once before,
translation.zh: 我们机器人以前就来过这个星球

translation.en: by our earliest ancestors, millennia ago.
translation.zh: 第一代祖先百万年前就来过

translation.en: They were on an exploratory mission to harvest Energon,
translation.zh: 它们来探险寻找超能量

translation.en: the lifeblood of our race.
Without it, we'll all perish, oxidize
translation.zh: 没有它 我们会腐烂氧化生锈

translation.en: and rust, like my wretched self.
translation.zh: 就像我这身架子 你们晓得等死的滋味吗

translation.en: Do you have any idea what it's like to slowly fall apart and die?
translation.zh: 你们晓得等死的滋味吗 您别总跑题 行吗？老先生

translation.en: Let's not get episodic, okay, old-timer?
translation.zh: 您别总跑题 行吗？老先生

translation.en: Beginning, middle, end. Facts. Details. Condense. Plot. Tell it.
translation.zh:
从头到尾简单说出事实和细节
把来龙去脉说清楚

translation.en: Somewhere buried in this desert,
our ancestors built a great machine.
translation.zh: 我们的祖先建了个巨型机器

translation.en: It harvests Energon by destroying suns.
translation.zh:
想要摧毁太阳来获得能量块 -摧毁太阳？
-把太阳炸掉？

translation.en: -Destroy suns? -You mean blow them up?
Yes. You see, in the beginning,
there were seven Primes, our original leaders.
translation.zh:
曾有七位至尊
都是第一批领袖

translation.en: And they set out into the universe,
seeking distant suns to harvest.
translation.zh: 进入宇宙寻找其他星系的恒星

translation.en: The Primes set out with one rule,
never destroy a planet with life,
translation.zh: 决不破坏有生命的星球

translation.en: until one of them tried to defy this rule.
And his name forevermore was the Fallen.
He despised the human race
and he wanted to kill you all by turning on that machine.
The only way to activate it is with a legendary key
translation.zh: 开启的方法就是用一把传奇钥匙

translation.en: called the Matrix of Leadership.
A great battle took place over possession of the Matrix.
translation.zh: 为原能矩阵的所有权展开大战

translation.en: The Fallen was stronger than his brothers,
so they had no choice but to steal and hide it from him.
translation.zh:
它们别无出路
只好将之偷了藏起来

translation.en: In the ultimate sacrifice, they gave
their lives to seal the Matrix away
in a tomb made of their very own bodies,
translation.zh: 将之藏在用自己身躯建造的坟墓中

translation.en: a tomb we cannot find.
translation.zh: 这座墓在哪里没有人知道

translation.en: Somewhere, buried in this desert, that deadly machine remains.
translation.zh:
就在这沙漠的某个地方
埋藏着那台特别的机器

translation.en: The Fallen knows where it is
and if he finds the tomb of the Primes,
your world will be no more.
Okay, so how do we stop him?
Only a Prime can defeat the Fallen.
translation.zh: 只有一名领袖能打败降临者

translation.en: Optimus Prime?
So, you've met a Prime?
Why, you must have met a great descendant.
translation.zh: 你肯定见过我族不少后裔

translation.en: Is he alive, here on this planet?
He sacrificed himself to save me.
translation.zh: 它为了救我牺牲了自己

translation.en: So, he's dead.
Without a Prime, it's impossible.
No one else could stop the Fallen.
So, the same energy that's gonna be used to reactivate the machine
could that energy somehow be used to reactivate Optimus
and bring him back to life?
It was never designed for that purpose,
but it's an energy like no other.
translation.zh: 本来没这功效 但这种能量非同寻常

translation.en: So, then how do you get us to the Matrix
translation.zh: 我们如何抢在霸天虎找到我之前

translation.en: before the Decepticons get to me?
Follow your mind, your map, your symbols.
translation.zh: 跟随你的思维 你的地图！你的符号

translation.en: What you carved in the sand, it's your clue.
When dawn alights the Dagger's Tip,
Three Kings will reveal the doorway.
Find the doorway.
Go now! Go!
That was my mission. It's your mission now.
translation.zh: 那曾是我的任务！现在归你们

translation.en: Go before the Decepticons find me and find you.
translation.zh:
要在霸天虎找到你我之前
先找到入口

translation.en: Okay, here's what my CIA contact says.
Ancient Sumerians used to call the Gulf of Aqaba the "Dagger's Tip."
translation.zh: 古代苏美尔人称亚喀巴海湾

translation.en: -That's the Dagger's Tip. -It's part of the Red Sea.
It divides Egypt and Jordan like the tip of a blade.
translation.zh: 它像一把匕首将埃及和约旦分开

translation.en: 29.5 degrees north, 35 east. Here it is.
translation.zh:
北纬29.5度 东经35度
就在这里

translation.en: First thing we've got to do is get Optimus to the Dagger's Tip.
How are you gonna get him halfway around the world?
translation.zh: 这得绕上大半个地球呢

translation.en: I'm gonna make a call.
We got cops.
I can't go to prison, guys.
