translation.zh: 爸爸 它们不要你 它们来找我！

translation.en: -RON: Oh, God! -Wait!
DEVASTATOR: Sam Witwicky.
Don't hurt them. This is what you want. You don't want them.
translation.zh:
别害他们
你要的是这个 不是他们

translation.en: -Go! Go! -Please, stop!
-Stop. -JUDY: Listen to your father!
(WHISTLING) RON: Just get out of here!
Just don't hurt them. I know what you want.
translation.zh: 别伤害他们 我知道你要什么

translation.en: RON: Just go! Just go!
And I know that you need me because I know about the Matrix.
translation.zh: 你们找我 我知道原能矩阵的事

translation.en: -RON: Don't do it, Sam... -Please, Dad.
They're going to kill us all anyway.
translation.zh:
拜托 爸
他们一样会杀了我们

translation.en: SAM: Here's what you want, right here.
Bumblebee!
Kill him, Bee. Kill him.
Stay tight, Ma.
Come on. Get in here.
-Bee? -Yeah.
-Hey! -I don't know
what's going on, but we've got to move!
translation.zh: 发生了什么事 但一定要走！

translation.en: RON: There's got to be a way out of here!
Judy, get back, get back, get back.
Against the wall! Against the wall!
Against the wall. Against the wall.
Bee! Bumblebee!
You get them somewhere safe, all right?
You've got to get in the car and get to safety.
No, this isn't up for discussion!
translation.zh: 别跟我争！ 你是我儿子！

translation.en: -You're my son! -You're my son! -I know.
-Dad... -We all go together!
-Listen... -We're all going together!
Dad, stop, okay? Get in the car.
translation.zh: 爸爸！别这样 快上车！

translation.en: He's gonna get you to safety.
You know, you run. You don't stop,
you don't hide, you run. You hear what I'm saying, okay?
I'll find you when you're safe.
translation.zh: 你们安全后我去找你们！

translation.en: -No. -You've got to let me go, Dad.
You have to let me go. You have to.
Ron.
Ron. Ron, let him go.
You come back! Come on.
JUDY: Ron! Mikaela! Mikaela!
-Go with my parents. -I'm not gonna go without you.
SOLDIER: Move to cover!
We got Jordanians!
We got help!
Down!
You okay, soldier?
We're gonna help you, soldier.
Let's get these wounded clear of the bird.
LEO: Stay still. Stay still. Don't move.
You all right, young man? You have a radio?
Hey, kid, it's been nice knowing you.
Remember what I did for my country.
This is my moment.
You're crazy!
ETA to station, two minutes.
-Put it on the main screen. -Sir. Yes, sir.
Predator 01.
Shit, it's a trick.
Commence Operation Firestorm. Send everyone.
translation.zh: 开始火风暴行动！集合陆战队

translation.en: Get those Marines on the ground.
Roll in strike packages...
Task Force Ripper, execute Lightning.
ARCEE: Spotted Sam!
IRONHIDE: Sam!
Ironhide!
Follow us to the pillars. We'll take you to Optimus.
translation.zh: 来 我们带你去找擎天柱

translation.en: IRONHIDE: Get out, Sam! Get to the pillars.
Let's go.
Oh, God. This is it. The pyramid's built right over the machine.
translation.zh: 妈妈呀！金字塔就建造在机器上

translation.en: If they turn that machine on, no more sun.
translation.zh:
它们一旦启动机器
太阳就没了！

translation.en: Not on my watch.
Not on my watch.
CAPTAIN: USS Stennis. Identify.
SIMMONS: Where the hell are you? Watching the Weather Channel?
translation.zh: 你躲在哪儿？看天气预报

translation.en: SportsCenter? I Dream of Jeannie or something?
translation.zh: 还是体育台？在看搞笑剧？

translation.en: We got 300 satellites up there.
Where the hell are all our men?
Identify yourself.
What is your name, sailor?
Wilder, Captain of the USS John C. Stennis
translation.zh: 怀尔德 美军斯滕尼斯号…

translation.en: aircraft carrier.
Okay, Captain Wilder.
This is Agent Seymour Simmons of Sector Seven.
translation.zh: 我是第七部的西蒙斯警探

translation.en: There is the mother of all non-biologicals
translation.zh: 这里有巨无霸非化学武器

translation.en: getting ready to blow up our sun.
Do you want to have a throwdown about my lack of clearance
or do you want to help save a gazillion lives?
translation.zh: 还是迅速拯救亿万生命？

translation.en: All right, Agent Simmons. I'm listening.
translation.zh: 西蒙斯警探 我在听

translation.en: Five clicks west of the Gulf,
we got ourselves an alien remodeling a pyramid.
translation.zh: 我面前的外星人想拆毁金字塔

translation.en: Our one hope is a prototype weapon called a rail gun,
translation.zh: 唯一的希望就是磁轨炮

translation.en: shoots a steel projectile at Mach 7.
That's classified.
Don't talk to me about classified, all right?
Now, if you've got a battleship in the Gulf, which I know you do,
translation.zh:
你们若有战舰在海湾
我知道你们肯定有

translation.en: you tell them to ready that weapon!
Contact destroyer USS KIDD.
GRAHAM: Alpha Team, flank left!
This way! Move it!
-Where do you need us, sir? -Protect those in line of fire.
Let's go! Go!
Give me your Comms. Come on. Epps!
translation.zh:
给我你的位置！
艾普斯！

translation.en: Right now, we need air support, ASAP!
translation.zh: 我们立刻需要空中支援

translation.en: Have troops in contact 20 miles northwest. Radar contact.
translation.zh: 让军队在你方西北20英里外

translation.en: Proceed to 88 Alpha Sierra...
B-1, snap 090.
You are approved to drop your 2,000-pound JDAMs.
translation.zh: 授权空投两千磅卫星导航弹

translation.en: -What you got? -I couldn't get to them, sir.
They're 600 meters away and heading right for the pillars.
All right. Precious cargo's coming!
SAM: Move!
Curse you!
IRONHIDE: Sam! Spotted Sam!
-Come on! -2-2 covering fire.
Two civilians, 12 o'clock!
translation.zh: 十二点钟方向 有两个人

translation.en: Cover for us!
Hold the air strike! We're rescuing civilians!
translation.zh: 暂停空袭！我们在抢救平民！

translation.en: Keep firing!
Come on! Mikaela!
Come on! Get in here!
Look who showed up.
You better have a good reason for us to be here.
translation.zh: 你最好能说出充分理由！

translation.en: -Where's Optimus? -He's right over there,
across the courtyard.
I got to get to him right now.
Not with an air strike coming.
translation.zh: 不行 没有空中掩护

translation.en: I have to get to him right now.
Whoa.
Go. Back, back, back, back.
-Go. -DECEPTICON: Listen up...
Okay.
Incoming!
Stick the landing.
Behold the glory of Jetfire!
Now let me show you how we brought the pain in my day!
translation.zh: 给大家看过去如何对付敌人！

translation.en: I'm too old for this crap.
Keep going, man, 15 rounds of fighting.
I am directly below the enemy's scrotum.
25.7 meters above sea level, 29.32 north.
Kill track, 5205...
Target acquired. Killing track.
translation.zh:
目标锁定
保持锁定第二轨道

translation.en: MAN ON PA: Two, one... Fire!
Yeah! Yeah!
PILOT: B-1's time on target, 30 seconds. 2,000-pound JDAMs inbound.
translation.zh:
B-1目标时间 30秒
两千磅卫星导航弹

translation.en: We're gonna make a break through the B's on my command, okay?
You guys stick with me, you understand? You stay on my ass.
translation.zh: 你们跟着我 懂吗？跟着我！

translation.en: PILOT: 1-1 tally orange smoke.
I hope these F-16s got good aim.
Yeah? Why is that?
I told them to hit the orange smoke.
translation.zh: 我叫他们瞄准橙色烟雾

translation.en: You mean that orange smoke?
It wasn't my best toss, okay?
PILOT: Viper, thunder.
Run!
Incoming!
Come on!
Sam!
Run!
Die!
Sam!
LENNOX: Hold your fire!
Sam!
Stay back! Mikaela, stay back!
Fucking do something!
Sam! Sam!
Sam! Sam! Sam! Sammy! Sam!
-Let me go! -LENNOX: Come, you gotta move.
You got to move, come on.
MEDIC: We got no pulse.
Starting CPR.
I have to see my kid! I got a son...
Sammy!
Sam!
MEDIC 1: Clear. MEDIC 2: Ready to shock.
Clear!
MEDIC 2: Ready to shock. One, two, three.
translation.zh: 准备电击 一 二 三

translation.en: Do it again!
No!
Okay, listen to my voice. I love you and I need you.
translation.zh: 听我的声音 我爱你 我需要你

translation.en: Please. Please, come back to me. Sam, please!
translation.zh: 求你 回到我身边 山姆！

translation.en: I love you.
SAM: Where am I? Where am I? Am I dead? Am I dead?
PRIME: We have been watching you a long, long time.
translation.zh: 我们一直在看你 为时已久

translation.en: You have fought for Optimus, our last descendant,
translation.zh: 你为擎天柱而战 我们最后的领袖

translation.en: with courage and with sacrifice, the virtues of a leader,
translation.zh: 勇敢无畏 不怕牺牲 领袖的美德

translation.en: a leader worthy of our secret.
The Matrix of Leadership is not found, it is earned.
translation.zh: 原能矩阵不靠找 靠赢得

translation.en: Return now to Optimus.
Merge the Matrix with his spark.
translation.zh: 将原能矩阵与火种源归并

translation.en: It is, and always has been, your destiny.
translation.zh: 这一直都将是你的命运

translation.en: Sam!
I love you. I love you.
Boy, you returned for me.
translation.zh: 孩子 你为我而回来

translation.en: A living Prime.
I don't believe it!
My Matrix!
Get up! Get up! Get up! Get up!
JETFIRE: Get up, Prime!
Oh, no.
SAM: He's turning on the machine!
You got to stop him! Get up!
Optimus!
MEGATRON: Fallen, my master.
My brothers could not stop me from this.
Yes, now I claim your sun.
Move!
Enemy target, top of pyramid. Engage!
Engage! Engage!
In moments, we'll be at firing strength.
translation.zh: 不必多久 我们将能量无限大！

translation.en: All my Decepticon life, I never did a thing worth doing until now.
translation.zh: 全体霸天虎朋友 我从未成就如此大事

translation.en: Optimus, take my parts
translation.zh: 擎天柱 拿去我的部件

translation.en: and you will have a power you've never known.
Fulfill your destiny.
Jolt! Electrify!
Transplant those afterburners.
Let's roll.
SOLDIER: Fire mission on the pyramids.
This planet will be dark forever.
translation.zh: 地球将永远黑暗不见天日

translation.en: Die, like your brothers!
They were your brothers, too.
Starscream!
You picked the wrong planet.
Give me your face.
I rise.
You fall.
No, no.
Not to call you a coward, Master,
translation.zh: 我不想劝您做胆小鬼 主人

translation.en: but sometimes cowards do survive.
translation.zh: 但往往胆小鬼都能活着

translation.en: This isn't over.
It took all this for you to tell me that you love me.
translation.zh: 经历了这些 你才愿意说你爱我

translation.en: You said it first.
Thank you, Sam, for saving my life.
translation.zh: 山姆 谢谢你救了我的命

translation.en: Welcome.
Thank you for believing in me.
OPTIMUS: Our races united by a history long forgotten
translation.zh: 我们的种族 因为被遗忘的过去

translation.en: and a future we shall face together.
translation.zh: 而走到一起同心协力面对未来

translation.en: I am Optimus Prime,
and I send this message so that our
pasts will always be remembered,
translation.zh: 我们的过去将永被铭记

translation.en: for in those memories, we live on.
translation.zh: 我们将活在他们记忆中

translation.en: So glad you could join us, Professor Einstein.
translation.zh: 很高兴你来听课 爱因斯坦教授

translation.en: (STUDENTS LAUGHING) Yeah, I was kind of busy.
Okay.
♪ Across this new divide ♪
translation.zh: 片名：变形金刚：复仇之战
